name: nightingale-wp
description: Wordpress theme for NHS Leadership Academy using nightingale-core

scripts.build: cat style.scss | node_modules/.bin/node-sass --include-path node_modules/ style.scss --output-style expanded > style.css
scripts.build-minify: cat style.scss | node_modules/.bin/node-sass --include-path node_modules/ style.scss --output-style expanded > style.css | node_modules/.bin/node-sass --include-path node_modules/ style.scss --output-style compressed > style.min.css
scripts.build-nightingale: mkdir -p node_modules/nightingale/dist && cat node_modules/nightingale/main.scss | node_modules/.bin/node-sass --include-path node_modules/ node_modules/nightingale/main.scss --output-style expanded > node_modules/nightingale/dist/main.css

author: NHS Leadership Academy
